head.title: ETHBTC Ethereum Bitcoin - Currency Exchange Rate Live Price Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: Ethereum Bitcoin traded at 0.0750168 this Tuesday November 8th, decreasing 0.0011998 or 1.57 percent since the previous trading session. Looking back, over the last four weeks, ETHBTC lost 10.14 percent. Over the last 12 months, its price rose by 5.33 percent. Looking ahead, we forecast Ethereum Bitcoin to be priced at 0.0740756 by the end of this quarter and at 0.0669084 in one year, according to Trading Economics global macro models projections and analysts expectations.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDHTG traded at 129.0000 on Tuesday November 8.
Historically, the Haitian Gourde reached an all time high of 129 in August of 2022. Haitian Gourde - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Haitian Gourde is expected to trade at 132.68 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 144.35 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDHTG spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency is currently worth in terms of the other. While the USDHTG spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDHTG forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

head.title: Guyanese Dollar - 2022 Data - 2008-2021 Historical - 2023 Forecast - Quote - Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: The USDGYD traded at 207.9800 on Tuesday November 8. Historically, the Guyanese Dollar reached an all time high of 208.78 in March of 2021.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDGYD traded at 207.9800 on Tuesday November 8.
Historically, the Guyanese Dollar reached an all time high of 208.78 in March of 2021. Guyanese Dollar - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Guyanese Dollar is expected to trade at 208.35 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 209.48 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDGYD spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency is currently worth in terms of the other. While the USDGYD spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDGYD forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

head.title: Jamaican Dollar - 2022 Data - 2015-2021 Historical - 2023 Forecast - Quote - Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: The USDJMD decreased 2.1000 or 1.38% to 150.0000 on Tuesday November 8 from 152.1000 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Jamaican Dollar reached an all time high of 156.67 in February of 2022.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDJMD decreased 2.1000 or 1.38% to 150.0000 on Tuesday November 8 from 152.1000 in the previous trading session.
Historically, the Jamaican Dollar reached an all time high of 156.67 in February of 2022. Jamaican Dollar - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Jamaican Dollar is expected to trade at 151.73 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 157.02 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDJMD spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency is currently worth in terms of the other. While the USDJMD spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDJMD forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

head.title: Costa Rican Colon - 2022 Data - 2008-2021 Historical - 2023 Forecast - Quote - Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: The USDCRC decreased 2.7750 or 0.45% to 615.1000 on Tuesday November 8 from 617.8750 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Costa Rican Colon reached an all time high of 691.76 in June of 2022.

meta.content: The USDCRC decreased 2.7750 or 0.45% to 615.1000 on Tuesday November 8 from 617.8750 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Costa Rican Colon reached an all time high of 691.76 in June of 2022.

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDCRC decreased 2.7750 or 0.45% to 615.1000 on Tuesday November 8 from 617.8750 in the previous trading session.
Historically, the Costa Rican Colon reached an all time high of 691.76 in June of 2022. Costa Rican Colon - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Costa Rican Colon is expected to trade at 621.21 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 640.22 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDCRC spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency, the USD, is currently worth in terms of the other, the CRC. While the USDCRC spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDCRC forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

meta.content: The USDCOP decreased 137.4400 or 2.69% to 4,966.5600 on Tuesday November 8 from 5,104.0000 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Colombian Peso reached an all time high of 5118.38 in November of 2022.

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDCOP decreased 137.4400 or 2.69% to 4,966.5600 on Tuesday November 8 from 5,104.0000 in the previous trading session.
Historically, the Colombian Peso reached an all time high of 5118.38 in November of 2022. Colombian Peso - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Colombian Peso is expected to trade at 5220.28 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 5641.48 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDCOP spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency, the USD, is currently worth in terms of the other, the COP. While the USDCOP spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDCOP forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.

head.title: Icelandic Krona - 2022 Data - 1998-2021 Historical - 2023 Forecast - Quote - Chart

meta.name: description
meta.content: The USDISK decreased 0.6300 or 0.43% to 145.0700 on Tuesday November 8 from 145.7000 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Icelandic Krona reached an all time high of 149.33 in December of 2008.

meta.content: The USDISK decreased 0.6300 or 0.43% to 145.0700 on Tuesday November 8 from 145.7000 in the previous trading session. Historically, the Icelandic Krona reached an all time high of 149.33 in December of 2008.

form.script: var TESymbol = 'USDISK'; console.log('TESymbol:', TESymbol);var TELanguage = ''; console.log('TELanguage:', TELanguage);TELastUpdate = '202211081700'; console.log('TELastUpdate:', TELastUpdate);TEChart = 'MK'; console.log('TEChart:', TEChart);var TEAlertsName= 'Icelandic Krona'; console.log('TEAlertsName:', TEAlertsName);

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

div.h2: The USDISK decreased 0.6300 or 0.43% to 145.0700 on Tuesday November 8 from 145.7000 in the previous trading session.
Historically, the Icelandic Krona reached an all time high of 149.33 in December of 2008. Icelandic Krona - data, forecasts, historical chart - was last updated on November of 2022.

div.h3: The Icelandic Krona is expected to trade at 148.62 by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. Looking forward, we estimate it to trade at 156.98 in 12 months time.

div.div: Please Paste this Code in your Website

The USDISK spot exchange rate specifies how much one currency, the USD, is currently worth in terms of the other, the ISK. While the USDISK spot exchange rate is quoted and exchanged in the same day, the USDISK forward rate is quoted today but for delivery and payment on a specific future date.
